title: Ambisonic City  AmbiX B + Stereo Sound Effects
description: Ambisonic City features 30 HD Ambient Sound Effects with a large selection of City center traffic and Ambience.
longDescription:
From 24/96 Sound Effects. Ambisonic City features 30 HD Ambient Sound Effects with a large selection of City center traffic and Ambience. Recorded with a Brahma Ambisonic Microphone and a Zoom F8 recorder and downloads in 2 configurations: .WAV Ambisonic B format (AmbiX FOA SN3D with ACN ordering 44.1 kHz, 16bit ), and .WAV Stereo (L-R) All tracks are 1 minute long and are edited to loop seamlessly. All new, original recordings. Drag and drop to add 3D immersive sound to any project. Recording locations are all from center perspective. Between traffic lanes on medians, bridges, walkways and tunnels to capture the movement of a city. All new, original recordings. Want to try it on your own system before buying? Download the B Format AmbiX .wav Demo file here: http://2496sfx.com/2496sfx_AmbisonicCity1_DEMO_Bformat _AmbiX.wav.zip  and plug it into your project.

Need custom Ambisonic tracks for your project? Drop us a line! http://2496sfx.com
technicalDetails:
• Features: 30AmbiX FOA SN3D with ACN ordering 44.1 kHz, 16bit ), and 30 Stereo

Number of Audio Waves: 60

Number of Audio Cues: 30

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit AmbiX and Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 30 Min

Supported Development Platforms: Audio files are compatible with any platform

Supported Target Build Platforms: Audio files are compatible with any target build platforms
